title: Unable To Connect To Server
body:
Opened my client, clicked find match and after champion selection it starts to load and then says "Unable to connect to the server. Please check your internet connection". 

My internet is running completely perfect . The first time it resulted in a remake losing 18 LP, the client functions as normal. I thought their maybe a error with the client, so i initiated a FULL REPAIR, and then found another ranked match, and the same thing happened, resulting in another remake (losing 16LP) and 5 games in low tier queue.

Has anyone else had similar issues and can point me in a direction to fixing the issue?

(Prior to this issue, i had been playing LOL for 8 or so hours, and then this issue just seemed to happen.

replies.body: same like your problem. since 4 day can not connect to a single game. even Training and custom games.  After the new patch i can not Play anymore? i do not know if Riot has noticed this kind of Problem.
Same thing happens to me, the screen turns white at the loading screen after champ select and then mentions a network error even though the internet is fine.
Happening to me too after the recent patch..
same crap is happening to me as well.. 1 leaver penalty and soon to be flame for being late in game. Has happened last ~4 games.
